Title: Simpsons Roasting on an Open Fire
Plot: The family is forced to spend all of their savings to get Bart's new tattooo removed, and with no money for Christmas, Homer is forced to become a store Santa.

Title: Bart the Genius
Plot: Bart ends up at a school for gifted children after cheating on an IQ test.

Title: Homer's Odyssey
Plot: After losing his job, Homer contemplates ending it all, until he discovers a new life path as a safety advocate.

Title: There's No Disgrace Like Home
Plot: After being embarrassed by the rest of the family at a company picnic, Homer becomes obsessed with improving their behavior towards each other.

Title: Bart the General
Plot: After being beaten up by Nelson Muntz one too many times, Bart turns to Grampa for help, and soon leads a rebellion against the school bully.

Title: Moaning Lisa
Plot: A depressed Lisa's spirit is lifted when she meets a jazz-man, Bleeding Gums Murphy.

Title: Dancin' Homer
Plot: Homer's heckling of the Springfield Isotopes baseball team during one of their games inadvertently leads to his appointment as the new team mascot.

Title: Bart vs. Thanksgiving
Plot: On Thanksgiving, Bart runs away after fighting with Lisa.

Title: Bart the Daredevil
Plot: After seeing a motorcycle daredevil at a monster truck show, Bart becomes a death-defying daredevil skateboarder.

Title: Itchy and Scratchy and Marge
Plot: Marge becomes a crusader against cartoon violence after watching The Itchy and Scratchy Show.

Title: Bart Gets Hit by a Car
Plot: While skateboarding down the street, Bart is hit by a car driven by Mr. Burns. Homer turns down Mr. Burns' token offer of $100, and instead hires ambulance-chaser Lionel Hutz to bring an outrageous lawsuit against the millionaire.

Title: One Fish, Two Fish, Blowfish, Blue Fish
Plot: After apparently consuming poison blowfish, Homer is told that he only has 24 hours to live.

Title: Undercover Burns
Plot: Mr. Burns goes undercover at the power plant as an employee named Fred and befriends Homer and the gang, but a jealous Smithers plots to bring the old Burns back.
